title: Design Scripting
description: Learning the concepts and application of scripting languages in architecture and form generation. Credit will not be awarded for both ARCH 4702 and ARCH 6502.
restrictions: __HEADER_0__Must be enrolled in one of the following Campuses:
prerequisites: ARCH 2472 Undergraduate Semester Minimum Grade of D and ARCH 2474 Undergraduate Semester Minimum Grade of D
